text: This is a list of rivers of Saint Kitts and Nevis. Only Cayon and Wingfield are permanent rivers, all other rivers listed are intermittent. ==Saint Kitts== *Parsons Ghut *Cayon River *Lodge Ghut *Ottleys Ghut ==Nevis== *Camp River ==References== * GEOnet Names Server *CIA Map *Tourist Map *Water Resources Assessment of Dominica, Antigua, Barbuda, St. Kitts and Nevis * R Saint Kitts and Nevis Rivers of Saint Kitts and Nevis S
title: List of rivers of Saint Kitts and Nevis
